title: Pope Francis Proposes ‘Universal Wage’ After Coronavirus Lockdowns
description: Pope Francis has proposed a basic “universal wage” as a remedy for the economic hardships day laborers face during the “unbearable” coronavirus lockdowns.
content:
ROME Pope Francis has proposed a basic universal wage as a remedy for the economic hardships day laborers face during the unbearable coronavirus lockdowns.
